root: ^On the bottom of your screen is your health and stressnometer.
^Your healthbar represents how many health points you have. If you lose all of your health, you lose the level.
^Your stressnometer represents the level of cortisol in your blood.
^Cortisol is the stress hormone. The more cortisol you have in the blood, the higher the stressnometer becomes.
^Cortisol gives you energy to deal difficult situations. The more cortisol you have, the more energy you have to deal with difficult situations.
^You will gain bonuses fighting enemies with a higher stressnometer. But be careful not to keep your stressnometer too high for long.
^Move using the joystick in the left, then attack using the button in the right.
^Now let's practice: defeat the enemy that spawns next.
